about_the_game: Mind Over Magnet is a puzzle platformer from Mark Brown, the creator of the YouTube channel Game Maker’s Toolkit. In this demo you'll help Magnus escape from the sewers, and head into the heart of the factory.
detailed_description: Mind Over Magnet is a puzzle platformer from Mark Brown, the creator of the YouTube channel Game Maker’s Toolkit. In this demo you'll help Magnus escape from the sewers, and head into the heart of the factory.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

name: Mind Over Magnet Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: An attractive puzzle platformer where you use magnetism to escape a factory. Meet a cast of magnet characters and work together to solve logical conundrums.
